golden_trumpet@fairytale.name: golden_trumpet
golden_trumpet@fairytale.examine: The trumpet has the words 'Don't call me a mirafone' engraved into the bell.
golden_trumpet@fairytale.desc[0]: A trumpet is here, shining invitingly.

door_heavy@fairytale.desc[1]: The heavy double doors are closed.
door_heavy@fairytale.name: door_heavy
door_heavy@fairytale.desc[2]: The heavy double doors are locked.
door_heavy@fairytale.desc[0]: The heavy double doors are open.

top_lid@fairytale.name: top_lid
top_lid@fairytale.examine: The lid is securable to the top of the coffin.
top_lid@fairytale.desc[0]: The lid of the coffin is transparent.

snake_rug@fairytale.name: snake_rug
snake_rug@fairytale.examine: The rug looks like a snake.
snake_rug@fairytale.desc[0]: A rug lies under your feet.

xara@fairytale.name: xara
xara@fairytale.examine:
Strange, it seems though in fairy tale land spoke a different language than
the real world, and you have found the text that explains their speech.  In
time you start figuring out what it all means and become fluent rather
quickly.  Sadly it may not help you settle the tension and violence here.
xara@fairytale.desc[0]: In the center of the fun house sits a volume that teaches the Xara language.

magic_wand@fairytale.name: magic_wand
magic_wand@fairytale.examine: It looks like a magic wand!
magic_wand@fairytale.desc[0]: You think you can see a stick protruding from the mouse-hole.

bird_nest@fairytale.name: bird_nest
bird_nest@fairytale.examine: It looks like a big nest.  I hope the mother bird isn't around...
bird_nest@fairytale.desc[0]: An empty nest is nestled among the branches.

hanging_shield@fairytale.name: hanging_shield
hanging_shield@fairytale.examine: A large 'E' in a circle has been stamped onto the front of the shield.
hanging_shield@fairytale.desc[0]: A shield hangs here, waiting for its owner.

hanging_sword@fairytale.name: hanging_sword
hanging_sword@fairytale.examine: It is embossed with a large 'E' in a circle.
hanging_sword@fairytale.desc[0]: A sword hangs here, waiting for its owner.

null_drawbridge@fairytale.name: null_drawbridge
null_drawbridge@fairytale.examine: The drawbridge looks well-used and very strong.
null_drawbridge@fairytale.desc[0]: A drawbridge extends across the chasm.

stone_altar@fairytale.name: Stone_Altar
stone_altar@fairytale.examine: The altar has been carved from a single block of stone.
stone_altar@fairytale.desc[0]: An altar stands before you, shining in the light.

pink_egg@fairytale.name: pink_egg
pink_egg@fairytale.examine: You wonder what kind of bird would lay a pink egg.
pink_egg@fairytale.desc[0]: A pink egg lies in the nest

g_bod_bot@fairytale.name: g_bod_bot
g_bod_bot@fairytale.desc[0]: The giant's body provides a way upto the table.

beauty_coffin@fairytale.name: beauty_coffin
beauty_coffin@fairytale.examine: The coffin looks just like Sleeping Beauty, only bigger.
beauty_coffin@fairytale.desc[0]: Sleeping Beauty lies inside her coffin, sleeping.

display_case@fairytale.name: display_case
display_case@fairytale.desc[0]: A display case stands in the corner

black_pot@fairytale.name: black_pot
black_pot@fairytale.desc[0]: A pot hangs over the fire.

bastard_sword@fairytale.name: bastard_sword
bastard_sword@fairytale.examine: The sword was made for a real bastard.
bastard_sword@fairytale.desc[0]: A huge bastard sword lies among the rocks.

tarnished_chest@fairytale.name: tarnished_chest
tarnished_chest@fairytale.desc[0]: A chest lies here, its locks tarnished with age.

green_balloon@fairytale.name: green_balloon
green_balloon@fairytale.examine: How could you burst such a pretty balloon?
green_balloon@fairytale.desc[0]: An inflated green balloon dances merrily.

jeweled_egg@fairytale.desc[1]: A large, jeweled egg is carefully balanced on the bars.
jeweled_egg@fairytale.name: jeweled_egg
jeweled_egg@fairytale.examine: The egg has been carefully carved by a master jeweller.
jeweled_egg@fairytale.desc[0]: A large, jeweled egg lies here.

porcelain_pig@fairytale.name: porcelain_pig
porcelain_pig@fairytale.examine: The pig turns up his nose at you.
porcelain_pig@fairytale.desc[0]: A tiny porcelain pig stands inside the case.

wolf_stew@fairytale.name: wolf_stew
wolf_stew@fairytale.desc[0]: A large portion of wolf stew is bubbling here.

large_tapestry@fairytale.name: large_tapestry
large_tapestry@fairytale.examine: The tapestry is embroidered with dragons and knights riding across a plain.

silvery_scythe@fairytale.name: silvery_scythe
silvery_scythe@fairytale.examine:
The scythe has some words carved into the handle: 'If found, please return to
the reaper.'

eye_cats@fairytale.name: eye_cats
eye_cats@fairytale.examine: The cat's eye is probably very valuable to the owner.
eye_cats@fairytale.desc[0]: A tiny cat's eye marble has been dropped here.

sting_stinger@fairytale.name: Sting_Stinger
sting_stinger@fairytale.examine: A giant bee's stinger rests here, dripping with poison.

large_pearl@fairytale.name: large_pearl
large_pearl@fairytale.examine:
You wonder how such a large pearl got so far from the seashore.
Carrier pigeons come to mind.
large_pearl@fairytale.desc[0]: A pearl, nearly the size of your head, lies here.

door_heavy_1@fairytale.desc[1]: The heavy double doors are closed.
door_heavy_1@fairytale.name: door_heavy_1
door_heavy_1@fairytale.desc[2]: The heavy double doors are locked.
door_heavy_1@fairytale.desc[0]: The heavy double doors are open.

rock_stone@fairytale.name: rock_stone
rock_stone@fairytale.desc[0]: One of the stones looks different from the rest.

null_bridge@fairytale.name: null_bridge
null_bridge@fairytale.examine: The drawbridge looks well-used and very strong.
null_bridge@fairytale.desc[0]: A drawbridge extends across the chasm.

singing_harp@fairytale.name: singing_harp
singing_harp@fairytale.examine: A beautiful woman seems to have grown into the harp somehow.  She smiles.
singing_harp@fairytale.desc[0]: A harp lies here, singing softly to itself.

diamond_ring@fairytale.name: diamond_ring
diamond_ring@fairytale.examine:
It is engraved 'To Ditzhead: Don't lose this one! -Love, GC'
You begin to wonder...
diamond_ring@fairytale.desc[0]: A diamond ring gleams from among the cushions of the seat.

red_balloon@fairytale.name: red_balloon
red_balloon@fairytale.examine: How could you burst such a pretty balloon?
red_balloon@fairytale.desc[0]: An inflated red balloon dances merrily.

magic_bean@fairytale.name: magic_bean
magic_bean@fairytale.examine: The bean sparkles with magical energies and seems to leap about in your hand.
magic_bean@fairytale.desc[0]: A bean lies here on the ground, dropped from someone's pocket.

g_bod_top@fairytale.name: g_bod_top
g_bod_top@fairytale.desc[0]: The giant's body provides a way off of the table.

blue_balloon@fairytale.name: blue_balloon
blue_balloon@fairytale.examine: How could you burst such a pretty balloon?
blue_balloon@fairytale.desc[0]: An inflated blue balloon dances merrily.

food_fish@fairytale.name: food_fish
food_fish@fairytale.examine: The fish look tasty.  I wonder if you could catch them?
food_fish@fairytale.desc[0]: A school of fish swims idly around the lake.

birds_key@fairytale.name: birds_key
birds_key@fairytale.examine: The key seems to have fallen from the leg of a passenger pigeon.
birds_key@fairytale.desc[0]: A key is hidden among the branches of the nest.

plaque_rock@fairytale.name: plaque_rock
plaque_rock@fairytale.examine: The plaque is engraved 'Beware of sleeping giants!'
plaque_rock@fairytale.desc[0]: A large rock is balanced upon the limestone.  It seems to have writing on it.

null_coffin@fairytale.name: null_coffin
null_coffin@fairytale.examine: The coffin holds the remains of Jessimine, a beautiful Goddess.
null_coffin@fairytale.desc[0]: A coffin lies here, carved from a block of crystal.

gold_key@fairytale.name: gold_key
gold_key@fairytale.examine: The key is lavishly decorated, but doesn't look very strong.
gold_key@fairytale.desc[0]: A silver and gold key lies inside the coffin.

rose_seed@fairytale.name: rose_seed
rose_seed@fairytale.examine: The seed is a rose seed, bringing to mind a really sappy country song.
rose_seed@fairytale.desc[0]: There is a seed here, almost ready to sprout.

hanging_banner@fairytale.name: hanging_banner
hanging_banner@fairytale.examine: The banner presents a large 'E' in a circle, the mark of Ender.
hanging_banner@fairytale.desc[0]: A banner hangs here, waiting to be carried into battle.

rotted_chest@fairytale.name: rotted_chest
rotted_chest@fairytale.desc[0]: A chest lies here, its hinges rotted away.

mossy_chest@fairytale.name: mossy_chest
mossy_chest@fairytale.examine: This chest is probably older than you are.
mossy_chest@fairytale.desc[0]: A chest lies here, covered with moss.

feather_pillow@fairytale.name: feather_pillow
feather_pillow@fairytale.examine: It sure looks comfortable.  You find yourself growing tired...
feather_pillow@fairytale.desc[0]: A large feather pillow lies atop the others.

golden_egg@fairytale.name: golden_egg
golden_egg@fairytale.examine: You wonder what kind of bird laid this golden egg.
golden_egg@fairytale.desc[0]: A golden egg lies in the nest.

curtain_tapestry@fairytale.name: Curtain_Tapestry
curtain_tapestry@fairytale.examine: The tapestry has been woven by expert weavers.
curtain_tapestry@fairytale.desc[0]: A tapestry hangs in front of you, depicting giants throughout history.

wine_flagon@fairytale.name: wine_flagon
wine_flagon@fairytale.desc[0]: A flagon of wine lies here.

large_shovel@fairytale.name: large_shovel
large_shovel@fairytale.examine: What kind of kid leaves his or her toys out in the playground?  Sheesh!
large_shovel@fairytale.desc[0]: A large, gold-plated shovel has been left here by a careless child.

steam_pipe_1@fairytale.name: steam_pipe_1
steam_pipe_1@fairytale.desc[2]: There is a pipe here.  It looks hot!

full_glass@fairytale.name: full_glass
full_glass@fairytale.examine: The glass is full of something which smells awful!
full_glass@fairytale.desc[0]: A glass stands before you, full of a bubbling liquid.

stone_cup@fairytale.name: stone_cup
stone_cup@fairytale.examine: The cup is full of a greenish liquid.  It smells awful!
stone_cup@fairytale.desc[0]: A cup stands before you, its contents bubbling softly.

stole_mink@fairytale.desc[1]: A mink stole is woven carefully into the nest.
stole_mink@fairytale.name: stole_mink
stole_mink@fairytale.examine: You wonder what mink the vixens stole this stole from.
stole_mink@fairytale.desc[0]: A mink stole has been discarded here.

puce_egg@fairytale.name: puce_egg
puce_egg@fairytale.examine: You wonder what kind of bird would lay a puce egg.
puce_egg@fairytale.desc[0]: A puce egg lies in the nest.

king_chest@fairytale.desc[1]: A chest is in the corner, padlock dangling.
king_chest@fairytale.name: king_chest
king_chest@fairytale.examine:
An engraved plate attached to the top of the chest reads:
Necessaries for Ruling the Kingdom.
king_chest@fairytale.desc[2]: A dusty chest with a large padlock is in the corner.
king_chest@fairytale.desc[0]: An open chest is in the corner.

beauty_crown@fairytale.name: beauty_crown
beauty_crown@fairytale.examine: The crown is covered with gems.
beauty_crown@fairytale.desc[0]: A crown lies in the coffin.

spray_raid@fairytale.name: spray_raid
spray_raid@fairytale.examine: The sword looks like it was made to kill bugs.
spray_raid@fairytale.desc[0]: A sword stands before you, striped black and red.  It is marked 'Raid'.

beauty_robe@fairytale.name: beauty_robe
beauty_robe@fairytale.examine: The robe is made of woven silk and gold threads.
beauty_robe@fairytale.desc[0]: A robe lies in the coffin.

steam_pipe@fairytale.name: steam_pipe
steam_pipe@fairytale.desc[2]: There is a pipe here.  It looks hot!

fairytale49@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale49@fairytale.description: You step onto a bar, and it tears loose...

fairytale25@fairytale.title: Moat
fairytale25@fairytale.description:
You stand on one side of a cliff. On the other side you see a castle,
and in front of the castle is a bridge mounted on wheels. Far below
you you see a smoking crater in the earth, as though something had
somehow burned through the original bridge on its way down.
  A drawbridge is here, mounted on wheels.

fairytale136@fairytale.title: Secret Stairs
fairytale136@fairytale.description: A staircase rises into the room above you.

fairytale71@fairytale.title: Grotto
fairytale71@fairytale.description:
You have entered a large room, lit by an opening in the wall to the
north. You suspect that you can squeeze through that hole if you
really try, and you realize that you hear rumbling behind it. The
walls are decorated with elaborate scenes of the Gods and
Goddesses at play.

fairytale75@fairytale.title: Lower Cavern
fairytale75@fairytale.description:
A light burns here, with no visible source. Perhaps the inhabitants of
these caverns were able to cast spells which lasted longer than they did.

fairytale37@fairytale.title: Entrance to the Great Hall
fairytale37@fairytale.description:
Two arched doors stand before you on the eastern wall. They are
elaborately carved, and seem to tell a story of a man named Jack
who stole many things from a giant. The story ends with a panel of a
large man eating a sandwich, from which two feet protrude. To the
west, you see colored light streaming in through the open door. The
walls are decorated with portraits of important giants of history.

fairytale52@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale52@fairytale.description: You climb on the monkey bars. Many bars are missing, and some are loose.

fairytale12@fairytale.title: The Balloon Ride
fairytale12@fairytale.description:
A large balloon is in the docking bay here. It looks like it would be
strong enough to lift you off the ground. Smaller versions of the
balloon are tied to the railing around the ride for decoration.

fairytale80@fairytale.title: Down the Well
fairytale80@fairytale.description:
You are partway down the well, in a good position to try for the door.
The rungs are much more slippery than you had thought that they would be.

fairytale15@fairytale.title: Lost in the Fun House
fairytale15@fairytale.description: You are lost in the Fun House. Mirrors surround you.

fairytale130@fairytale.title: Portal
fairytale130@fairytale.description:
You are inside a large, wooden portal. Along the north wall are a
series of levers marked 'up', 'down', and 'open'. The lighting in this
box is provided by tubes which glow softly above you.

fairytale58@fairytale.title: End of the Road
fairytale58@fairytale.description:
Happy Road ends here. To leave the village, one must go north. To
the south is a rather large department store, and to the east and
west are houses labeled 'Ariel' and 'Rumplestilskin', respectively.

fairytale84@fairytale.title: Middle of Stairs
fairytale84@fairytale.description:
You stand on a landing, halfway up the tower. You are level with
one of the displays of equipment. The snake rug continues up and down,
and the colorful patterns embroidered on it swirl before your eyes.

fairytale48@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale48@fairytale.description: You climb on the monkey bars. Many bars are missing, and some are loose.

fairytale131@fairytale.title: Spinning Room
fairytale131@fairytale.description:
You have entered a large spinning room. Four spinning wheels are
arranged in a square, at the center of which is a large pile of
spindles, all fully threaded. To the east is the wooden portal
west is another room.

fairytale117@fairytale.title: Bedroom
fairytale117@fairytale.description:
You have entered the smaller of two guest rooms. The only exit is
to the north, into the hallway. A closet, a small bed, a tiny desk,
and a padded chair decorate the room. A tapestry is spread across
the west wall, bulging slightly in the center as though it were
warped by water.

fairytale105@fairytale.title: Pantry
fairytale105@fairytale.description:
You have entered a large food-storage room. It is empty now,
perhaps cleaned out by the inhabitants of the three small mouse
holes which are evenly placed on the south wall. One of the shelves
has been unfastened from the east wall.

fairytale36@fairytale.title: In the Scar
fairytale36@fairytale.description:
There is a huge scar across the trunk of the tree, the product of
some ancient storm. It prevents any further passage upwards. The
tree here looks diseased and weakened, but it is healthy below.

fairytale4@fairytale.title: In the Vine
fairytale4@fairytale.description:
You stand inside a small rooms. A few copies of Playbug are 
scattered around the room; one is open to the centerfold.
The room looks like a basic bachelor's pad.

fairytale59@fairytale.title: Store
fairytale59@fairytale.description:
You have entered an all-purpose store, where you may purchase
food, drink, and weapons. The proprietor wanders in and out intermittently.

fairytale55@fairytale.title: Happy Road
fairytale55@fairytale.description:
Happy Road stretches to the north and south. It has been named for
the line of smiley faces which lie in the center of the road, dividing
it in half. A sign stands here, informing you that the Three Pigs live
to the west and Cinderella to the east.

fairytale122@fairytale.title: Stairs
fairytale122@fairytale.description:
You stand at the top of the stairs which descend to the landing and
porch below. The staircase is encased in glass, and you can see the
forest far below you. Above you you notice that the mansion
continues to rise. A door leads west into the sitting room.

fairytale23@fairytale.title: Landslide
fairytale23@fairytale.description:
You stand amidst a pile of fallen limestone, as though a mountain
has collapsed in upon itself. Cleared through the rubble is a path to
the north.

fairytale118@fairytale.title: Bathroom
fairytale118@fairytale.description:
The bathroom is quite simple. A stool is in the northwest corner
of the room, connected to the floor by a tube. A basin stands against
the west wall, filled with warm water. A larger basin is in the
southwest corner, also filled with water.

fairytale93@fairytale.title: Loft
fairytale93@fairytale.description:
You have entered a small loft, which contains three beds. One of
them is very large, one is medium-sized, and the third is rather
small. A series of curtains can be pulled to divide the room, but
they stand open. On the medium-sized bed lies a pile of pillows.

fairytale104@fairytale.title: Living Room East
fairytale104@fairytale.description:
You are in a large living room, which extends the depth of the
house. To the west it continues, and to the south is a kitchen. Out
the window to the east you see a staircase going up to the next
level. A card table is set up here, with a deck of cards and four
piles of colored discs. Four chairs have been carefully set around
the table. In the corner is a bar, fully stocked.

fairytale35@fairytale.title: On the Branch
fairytale35@fairytale.description:
You stand on the swaying branch of an ancient tree. The bark is
thick and gnarled, and you suspect that you could climb here. To the
north you see a room full of windows, and above you is a huge scar in
the trunk.

fairytale89@fairytale.title: Cinderella's House
fairytale89@fairytale.description:
You stand in the doorway to the fabled house of Cinderella. Her
famous housecleaning abilities are reflected in this dust-free
environment. A stairway leads up to a small landing, on which you
can see a table. A fireplace on the far wall, where she was rumored
to have slept, has a pallet spread in it. Wandering over to a table,
you are startled to see your reflection in it. Amazingly, she has
even done the windows.

fairytale1@fairytale.title: Garden
fairytale1@fairytale.description:
You stand in an unexplored section of the garden. The way back
to the rest of the mansion gardens is to the south. Before you stands
a huge vine, rising up into the clouds. It looks strong enough to hold you.

fairytale40@fairytale.title: Padded Room
fairytale40@fairytale.description:
A long slide ends here, in a room which is entirely padded. Foam
rubber lines the walls, the ceiling, and the floor. A hole in the
ceiling is marked 'Fairyland', and a hole in the floor is marked 'Heaven'.

fairytale9@fairytale.title: Carnival Entrance
fairytale9@fairytale.description:
You have entered a carnival. All around you, you see families enjoying
themselves, riding rides and eating cotton candy. To the north is a ferris
wheel, to the west a balloon ride, and the the east you see the entrance to
a fun house.

fairytale53@fairytale.title: Sandbox
fairytale53@fairytale.description:
Here children dig in the sand, building castles and towns. Upon
your arrival, they throw sand at you and yell and shout, protesting
the presence of an adult on a children's world.

fairytale50@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale50@fairytale.description: You climb on the monkey bars. Many bars are missing, and some are loose.

fairytale18@fairytale.title: Lost in the Fun House
fairytale18@fairytale.description: You are lost in the Fun House. Mirrors surround you.

fairytale64@fairytale.title: The River
fairytale64@fairytale.description:
A river flows past you, tinkling peacefully. The plants which grow
here create a peaceful, gentle feeling. You are overcome by an urge
to go to sleep on this manicured lawn. To the south is a lake, in
which you see an island. To the north the river continues.

fairytale57@fairytale.title: Happy Road
fairytale57@fairytale.description:
You have entered the well-off section of the village. The houses to
the east and west are modeled after Victorian mansions, and you
suspect that they might still be occupied. A plaque on the western
house reads 'Snow White', and the eastern plaque is 'Sleeping Beauty.'

fairytale83@fairytale.title: Bottom Floor
fairytale83@fairytale.description:
A flight of stairs rises above you, and as you follow the spiral
with your eyes, you find your gaze straying to the decorations on the
walls. Swords, shields, and various multi-colored banners hang in
colorful displays, and are interspersed with arched windows and oil
lamps. Your head begins to spin as your blood drains from it, and you
tear your gaze away from the walls to focus on the floor. There you
see a rug which looks like a psychedelic snake. The rug continues up
the stairs.

fairytale100@fairytale.title: Kingdom Overlook
fairytale100@fairytale.description:
This large, circular room has windows on all sides and offers a
perfect view of the kingdom below. The air is a bit stale and dusty,
and it seems like this room has not been used much in recent times.

fairytale137@fairytale.title: Sleeping Beauty's Room
fairytale137@fairytale.description:
You have entered a large, lavishly-decorated room. This must be
the end of your quest, for among the gold brocade and silver
furniture is a coffin. A throne rests against the north wall, inlaid
with expensive gems. A crown rests on the throne, also inlaid with
shining stones. A closet filled with valuable robes and gowns is
against the east wall. The coffin is made of an alloy which you do
not recognize, which seems to reflect the light. The coffin has been
carved with Sleeping Beauty's name and face.

fairytale20@fairytale.title: Lost in the Fun House
fairytale20@fairytale.description: You are lost in the Fun House. Mirrors surround you.

fairytale21@fairytale.title: Lost in the Fun House
fairytale21@fairytale.description:
You are lost in the Fun House. Mirrors surround you.
  One mirror stands in front of you, clearer than any other mirror
you have ever seen. Reflected in the mirror, next to your own
reflection, is the reflection of a huge block of silver.

fairytale77@fairytale.title: Treasure Chamber
fairytale77@fairytale.description:
You have discovered the treasure chamber of the ancient priests of
the rainbow tribe! The cavern is damp and cold, and the sights are as
chilling as the air. Skeletons lie randomly around the room, as
though thrown around by some giant hand. Scraps of fabrics and
jewelry are visible mixed with the bones.

fairytale26@fairytale.title: Pit
fairytale26@fairytale.description:
You have fallen into a pit which rises as far up as the eye can see.
In the center of the pit is a small disc. As you approach it for a
closer look, it opens and a tiny woman jumps out. She screams 'In
the name of glorious queen Rosmar, I claim this--' she breaks off as
she catches sight of you. 'Oh dear,' she exclaims, 'It's already
inhabited!'
With that, she jumps back into the disc, which closes and rises from
the ground. A violet beam of light erupts from it and spears you
between the eyes...

fairytale86@fairytale.title: Beyond the Mirror
fairytale86@fairytale.description:
You stand at the foot of a staircase which winds up and into the
darkness. This room appears to have been hewn from solid rock, and
a few pebbles lie on the floor. From above you, you smell foxes.

fairytale94@fairytale.title: Mother Hubbard's
fairytale94@fairytale.description:
You enter a sparsely furnished one-room house. A wooden chair
sits before a rickety table, and a bed lies in the corner. A thin
mattress rests upon the bed. The only thing of interest is a cupboard
on the wall, carved with elaborate patterns.

fairytale116@fairytale.title: Bedroom
fairytale116@fairytale.description:
You have entered the largest of two bedrooms. To the west is the
bathroom, and to the south is the hallway. A large bed rests here
beneath a canopy, which is supported by four elaborate oak posts. A
closet stands next to the window. A small desk dozes quietly near
the east wall, covered with papers.

fairytale39@fairytale.title: Slide
fairytale39@fairytale.description: You stand at the top of a slide. Below you is the entrance to Fairyland.

fairytale45@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale45@fairytale.description: You climb on the monkey bars. Many bars are missing, and some are loose.

fairytale107@fairytale.title: Stairs
fairytale107@fairytale.description:
A set of stairs climb the wall of the house here, encased in glass
to protect it from the wind and rain. A window to the west looks
into a large living room.

fairytale114@fairytale.title: Top Porch
fairytale114@fairytale.description:
You stand on a railed porch. A glass roof is above you, and you can
see clouds drift slowly past. To the east you may look down on the
trees, which are just below your height. To your south is a large
metal cube, and to the west is a hallway. Lying around the porch are
various pieces of lounge furniture, such as a patio chair, a
hammock, and a porch swing. This room appears to be a lovely place
for a porch party.

fairytale56@fairytale.title: Happy Road
fairytale56@fairytale.description:
Happy Road continues here to the north and south, and you realize
that the houses on the right and left sides of the road look as though
they have been abandoned for some time. A sign on the house to the east
says 'Three Bears', and the sign on the western house reads 'Mom Hubbard.'

fairytale113@fairytale.title: Stairs
fairytale113@fairytale.description:
You stand on a small platform, which serves as a landing. To your
west is a mirror on the wall of the house, and to the south is a
screened door through which you can see a porch, complete with
furniture. The stairs continue up and down, encased in glass to
protect people from the elements.

fairytale3@fairytale.title: On the Vine
fairytale3@fairytale.description:
The vine here is softer than that above and below it. You suspect
that parasites have been nibbling at it. It continues up and down.

fairytale41@fairytale.title: Music Room
fairytale41@fairytale.description:
This room is dedicated to music. A beautiful stereo system lines
the north wall, and a rack of CDs lines the south wall. Pictures of
famous composers are on the western wall. A door to the east leads
outside, and a hole in the floor leads to a padded room.

fairytale106@fairytale.title: Porch
fairytale106@fairytale.description:
You stand on the back porch, gazing out into the forest which
surrounds the house. To the north, you see a staircase leading up the
side of the house, enclosed in glass. To your south is a large steel
cube, and to the west is a kitchen.

fairytale91@fairytale.title: The Three Pigs
fairytale91@fairytale.description:
This residence appears to be the brick home of the three little
pigs. The smell of a finely-cooked stew assails your nose,
apparently emanating from the pot over the cooking fire. The entire
house is built of brick, and is done in the style known as 'early
swine', Pictures of famous pigs line the walls, such as Porky,
Penelope, and Miss Piggy. A newspaper on the end-table advertises
the opening of a new Piggly-Wiggly supermarket, and lies next to an
illustrated version of 'Charlotte's Web'. Small porcelain pigs are
displayed prominently in a case on the wall.

fairytale69@fairytale.title: Cave Entrance
fairytale69@fairytale.description:
You stand before the dark mouth of a cave, which seems to extend
far into the distance. To the west is a cloud of mist, in which you
see a rainbow suspended in the air.

fairytale6@fairytale.title: Cloud Bank
fairytale6@fairytale.description:
You stand among a field of clouds. To the east, in the distance, you see
a castle rising out of some white mountains. To the west, a huge rose towers
above you. From the north you smell cotton candy and hear children laughing.
Below you the vine reaches through the clouds and eventually reaches the
ground.

fairytale47@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale47@fairytale.description: You grab onto a bar, and it tears loose...

fairytale96@fairytale.title: Sleeping Beauty
fairytale96@fairytale.description:
This is the fabled home of Sleeping Beauty. Somewhere in this
house, it is rumored, a woman sleeps, having been cursed by an evil
witch to slumber forever. The house itself is rather large, and you
suspect it would take quite some time to investigate the whole
place. A kitchen is to the east, the living room is to the north, and
to the south lies the dining room.
Here, in the entrance hall, a series of coat hooks line the wall.

fairytale46@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale46@fairytale.description: You climb on the monkey bars. Many bars are missing, and some are loose.

fairytale81@fairytale.title: A Secret Room
fairytale81@fairytale.description:
What's a fairytale without a few secrets?  Here is a hidden room, known
only to immortals.

fairytale7@fairytale.title: Giant's Garden
fairytale7@fairytale.description:
Tall flowers and huge vegetables loom above you. Some of the plants look
strong enough to support your weight, including a beautiful rose which casts
its delicate shadow over you.

fairytale27@fairytale.title: Drawbridge
fairytale27@fairytale.description:
A drawbridge is here, mounted on wheels. It can be pushed across
the moat to bridge the gap. The castle itself rises far above you to
the east.

fairytale51@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale51@fairytale.description: You climb on the monkey bars. Many bars are missing, and some are loose.

fairytale8@fairytale.title: Inside the Rose
fairytale8@fairytale.description:
You stand inside a beautiful rose, as big as a house. You are almost
knocked out by its smell. From your vantage point, you can see a carnival
with a ferris wheel and balloon rides. Also, far in the distance, you can
make out a castle which seems to be floating on a cloud.

fairytale22@fairytale.title: Rolling Hills
fairytale22@fairytale.description:
The clouds here slope gently up and down, and in some places grass
has sprouted. In the distance to the east you see a floating castle,
and to the north lies a pile of fallen rubble. To the west you see a
clearing.

fairytale119@fairytale.title: Hallway
fairytale119@fairytale.description:
The hallway ends here. It extends to the east, and to the south and
the north are doors. The southern door is open.

fairytale102@fairytale.title: Family Room
fairytale102@fairytale.description:
You have entered a large room, in which the family commonly spent
time before the Time of the Great Sleep. Couches and chairs are
spread artistically around the room, facing each other and the tables
alternately. A small hole is in the floor, from which flows a stream
of hot air. The furniture is covered with transparent material
which is coated with a layer of dust. North of you is the entry room,
and to the east is the pantry.

fairytale2@fairytale.title: On the Vine
fairytale2@fairytale.description:
The vine seems to be solid, and you find it easy to climb both up
and down.

fairytale61@fairytale.title: On the Lake
fairytale61@fairytale.description:
To your east is an island. It appears to be man-made, as evidenced
by the metallic sheen of the bank. A huge statue rises from the
center of the island, representing a tall woman with benevolent
features and outstretched hands.

fairytale112@fairytale.title: Sewer Intake
fairytale112@fairytale.description:
The first thing you notice about this room is the large pipe which
sticks out of the ceiling. From it, a trickle of water runs down into
a large cavity in the floor. From below, you hear the sound of
rushing water, as if from an underground river. It would appear that
you have discovered an early form of sewer system.

fairytale44@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale44@fairytale.description: You climb on the monkey bars. Many bars are missing, and some are loose.

fairytale126@fairytale.title: Store-Room
fairytale126@fairytale.description:
You stand in a store-room. Here artists keep their materials for
their art, including canvasses, paints, and slabs of stone. Light
enters the room from the west door.

fairytale70@fairytale.title: Cave Mouth
fairytale70@fairytale.description:
Below you, you see a light glowing in the darkness. The cavern
itself extends in all directions.

fairytale125@fairytale.title: Gallery
fairytale125@fairytale.description:
This half of the gallery is devoted to sculpture. 'Three Women
Praying', piece by Mac Gimse, is the most prominent, and other
pieces are demonstrated here as well. To the north is more of the
gallery, to the east is a closed door, and to the south is a work-
room.

fairytale38@fairytale.title: The Giant's Table
fairytale38@fairytale.description:
You enter a room whose size overwhelms you. The floor is wood,
but the planks are bigger than you have ever seen. Facing you is a
huge loaf of bread, twice your height, and on your right is a block of
cheese nearly as large as the loaf.

fairytale87@fairytale.title: Stairs
fairytale87@fairytale.description:
A strong breeze blows through here, threatening to extinguish your light.
You see cave paintings here, depicting giant foxes hunting tiny human beings.

fairytale31@fairytale.title: Prison Stairs
fairytale31@fairytale.description:
A set of stairs leads up to the surface, but the steps are too wide
for someone of your height to climb. Fortunately, someone has tied a
rope to the railing at the top of the stairs, making the ascent
possible.

fairytale66@fairytale.title: Cave Mouth
fairytale66@fairytale.description:
The river flows through a hole in the ground here, which is easily
eight feet in diameter. Above the hole hangs a cloud of mist, and a
rainbow arcs through the cloud. The river roars as it plunges
through the hole, and feel yourself slowly growing deaf. Through the
cloud you can vaguely make out the entrance to a cave.

fairytale30@fairytale.title: Prison Stairs
fairytale30@fairytale.description:
You stand on a set of stairs which spirals down into the depths
of the earth. The steps are spaced too widely for you to walk on
them, but some brave adventurer has tied a rope to the railing,
making it possible to climb down rather than walk.

fairytale110@fairytale.title: Coal Room
fairytale110@fairytale.description:
You have entered a large room, full of coal. The walls are thick
with dust, and the coal is stacked hip-deep along the walls, sloping
down to a narrow path which leads from the south door to the north
doorway.

fairytale92@fairytale.title: Three Bears
fairytale92@fairytale.description:
The owners of this house seem to have left, perhaps to take a walk
through the forest. The basic number of the house appears to be
three: Three bowls stand on the table, steaming softly, three chairs
sit around the triangular table, three LA-Z-Y BEAR chairs rest
around the fireplace, and three steps lead up to the sleeping loft.

fairytale82@fairytale.title: Base of Tower
fairytale82@fairytale.description:
You are standing at the base of a tall tower. Written on the wall,
high above you, are the words 'ICBM'. The tower itself looks like an
ancient version of the missile which you just launched, or perhaps
just a model of it. To the east is a small door, and all around you is
a tall wall.

fairytale99@fairytale.title: Library
fairytale99@fairytale.description:
Books line the walls of this large room, filling you with awe of
anyone who could have read them all.  Classics such as "Moby Dick",
"Pride and Prejudice" and "Treasure Island" are prevalent, mixed 
with lesser-known works such as "The Dark is Rising" and the 
"Books of Blood".  Four doors lead from this room: one returning 
to the north, one to the east marked 'Alice', one to the west
marked 'Peter', and one to the south marked 'Dorothy.'  Through each 
is a different scene, all of which look somehow familiar. . . .

fairytale76@fairytale.title: Underground Lake
fairytale76@fairytale.description:
The waterfall ends here in a pool, and the river flows on through a
myriad of tiny holes. In the pool, you see the remains of many dead
adventurers who tried to sail down the falls. A tube on the wall
spews forth filthy water.

fairytale98@fairytale.title: Rumplestilskin's House
fairytale98@fairytale.description:
You enter a large, cave-like room. Doors lead to the north, west,
and south, but gossamer-like strands of webbing stretch across
them and bar them from your use. The only clear door is the one you
entered from, to the east. In the center of the room is a crib, in
which a sack full of gold rests, but the webbing covers it as well.
Following the strands with your eye, you realize that they originate
from a spinning wheel which lies in the corner.

fairytale120@fairytale.title: Linen Closet
fairytale120@fairytale.description:
This closet is a storage room for linens. Sheets, pillowcases, and
dressing gowns are stacked on the shelves which line the walls.

fairytale103@fairytale.title: Living Room West
fairytale103@fairytale.description:
You are in a large living room, which extends the depth of the
house. A piano stands in one corner, and a large display case is next
to the southern door. The display case is filled with several pieces
of fine china and valuable-looking artifacts. A white pipe extends
from ceiling to floor, from which you can hear the sound of running
water. To the south is the entry room, and to the east the living
room extends.

fairytale128@fairytale.title: Art Room
fairytale128@fairytale.description:
You have entered a workshop for artists. Tools lie around the
room, including a large oven, a potter's wheel, and some easels.
Unfinished works are in the proper places: paintings on the easels,
sculptures on pedestals, and pots on the wheel.

fairytale109@fairytale.title: Cellar
fairytale109@fairytale.description:
You have entered the cold storage cellar. Foods such as meat and
wine were stored here in barrels of salt, such as those you see lying
around. A heavy iron door is set into the north wall, which is warm
to the touch. The cellars smell faintly musty, although the walls are
clean. A staircase leads up to the pantry.

fairytale13@fairytale.title: Fun House Entrance
fairytale13@fairytale.description:
'Step right up,' the vendor calls, and you feel compelled to enter
the maze of mirrors to the north.

fairytale88@fairytale.title: Vixen Nest
fairytale88@fairytale.description:
You have entered the lower level of the Fox's Den. It would appear,
from the droppings and tiny bones, that this area is still inhabited.
The nest itself is a pile of old furs, mud, and sticks, and three fox-
shaped depressions are apparent in these furs.

fairytale101@fairytale.title: Kitchen
fairytale101@fairytale.description:
Sleeping Beaty's cooks did not leave in a hurry. They out away
their many utensils in racks on the wall. The feast, left out on the
table for travellers, has long since rotted away. To the west of you
is the entry room, to the south is the pantry, and to the north is the
living room. A table is here, bolted to the floor, scarred by knives
and stained with dried blood.

fairytale134@fairytale.title: Weaving Room
fairytale134@fairytale.description:
This room is devoted to the art of weaving. Tapestries decorate
the walls, and an intricate pattern decorates the rug on the floor. A
large loom stands against the north wall, on which hangs a nearly
finished rug. A window looks out onto the street below to the west;
a door leads south to the sewing room, and to the east is a closed door.

fairytale19@fairytale.title: Lost in the Fun House
fairytale19@fairytale.description: You are lost in the Fun House. Mirrors surround you.

fairytale54@fairytale.title: Fairyville
fairytale54@fairytale.description:
You stand at the entrance to Fairyville. The village spreads out
to your south, the playground is to the north, and the Fairyville
Church stands to the west. To the east is a lake, and you see a
sailboat slowly moving across it.

fairytale108@fairytale.title: Portal
fairytale108@fairytale.description:
You are inside a large, wooden portal. Along the north wall are a  
series of levers marked 'up', 'down', and 'open'. The lighting in this
box is provided by tubes which glow softly above you.

fairytale14@fairytale.title: Lost in the Fun House
fairytale14@fairytale.description:
You have entered a maze of mirrors. No matter where you turn,
you see yourself.

fairytale68@fairytale.title: Underground Waterfall
fairytale68@fairytale.description:
Your body is caught up in the rush of water and is smashed
repeatedly into the rocks. One by one, your items are pulled from
your hands and you die empty-handed.

fairytale97@fairytale.title: Mermaid's Home
fairytale97@fairytale.description:
The little mermaid, Ariel, has decorated her home with pictures of
her father and sisters, as well as a statue of her husband, Eric. A
large swimming pool is set into the east wall, where you see a fish
and a crab. When you enter, they eye you suspiciously. Many common
household items, such as Snarfblatts and Dinglehoppers, have been
placed around the room in positions of honor. One Snarfblatt hangs
on the wall with a plaque beneath it.

fairytale60@fairytale.title: Lake
fairytale60@fairytale.description:
The lake is a large body of water. It looks very deep, and you could
probably swim in it if you wanted to, but you doubt that the fish that
live there would appreciate that. To the west is a playground, and to
the north is a river, feeding into the lake. In the distance, to the
east, you can see a statue standing alone on an island.

fairytale16@fairytale.title: Lost in the Fun House
fairytale16@fairytale.description: You are lost in the Fun House. Mirrors surround you.

fairytale95@fairytale.title: Snow White
fairytale95@fairytale.description:
A beautiful room is spread out around you. A crystal box shines in
the center of the room, illuminated by light pouring in through a
large picture window. Around the box are seven small people,
perhaps dwarves. As you enter they look up at you with pleading
eyes, as though begging something from you.
Lying in the box is a beautiful woman with pale skin and black hair.
In her dainty hand she holds an apple with one bite missing. You look
around the room and see a sign which proclaims that 'Only a prince
may awaken the sleeping beauty.'

fairytale124@fairytale.title: Gallery
fairytale124@fairytale.description:
This gallery is lined with pictures and portraits in all mediums,
depicting various people, various scenes, and various images. Some
that you recognize are 'The Garden of Earthly Delights' by
Hieronomous Bosch, 'Icarus Descending' by Brughel, and 'Time' by
Salvidor Dali. Seats are provided for people who wish to sit and
observe the art.

fairytale42@fairytale.title: Playground
fairytale42@fairytale.description:
Children play here, giggling and laughing. They push each other
and mock-fight on the swing-set. To the north is a sand-box, to the
south is a country lane, to the west is the music room, and to the
east is a river. A set of monkey bars climbs up into the sky.

fairytale129@fairytale.title: Portal
fairytale129@fairytale.description:
You are inside a large, wooden portal. Along the north wall are a
series of levers marked 'up', 'down', and 'open'. The lighting in this
box is provided by tubes which glow softly above you.

fairytale17@fairytale.title: Lost in the Fun House
fairytale17@fairytale.description: You are lost in the Fun House. Mirrors surround you.

fairytale65@fairytale.title: The River
fairytale65@fairytale.description:
The river continues to the north and south, and the pleasant hills
have changed to rocky cliffs which bar further passage to the east
and west. You hear a loud roaring noise from the north.

fairytale33@fairytale.title: Window Room
fairytale33@fairytale.description:
This room is filled with towering stained-glass windows. It seems
that it was once a church of some sort, but you do not recognize any
of the figures depicted in the glass. An altar stone still stands here,
its cold grey stone reflecting the colored light from the windows.
One of the windows is clear, and you see a tree outside. One branch
seems to be close enough to the window to touch.

fairytale5@fairytale.title: On the Vine
fairytale5@fairytale.description:
The vine continues both up and down. The sky above you is obscured by a
low-hanging cloud bank, into which the vine disappears. Looking down, you
realize that a fall from this height would surely kill you.

fairytale62@fairytale.title: Steel Island
fairytale62@fairytale.description:
A metal beach stretches around the base of a huge statue. A door
enters the base of the statue to the east, and a plaque sits next to it.
The plaque reads 'Jessimine the Goddess'. Scratched into the steel
beneath it, as though by a long fingernail, is the epitaph 'I'm sorry...'

fairytale79@fairytale.title: Down the Well
fairytale79@fairytale.description:
The rungs are much more slippery than you had thought. Finally,
you reach the bottom. With a joyful cry you step out onto the ground
and sink up to your neck in mud. The rain begins to fall...

fairytale43@fairytale.title: On the Bars
fairytale43@fairytale.description: You climb on the monkey bars. Many bars are missing, and some are loose.

fairytale111@fairytale.title: Furnace Room
fairytale111@fairytale.description:
You are in a large room, dominated by a huge furnace. The furnace
has a large steel grate mounted on it, through which you can see
flaming coals. A small pile of coal lies here, next to a shovel. A
tube extends from the roof of the furnace to the ceiling of the room.
To the south is the coal room, and to the west you can hear a
gurgling noise, as though water were running there.

fairytale132@fairytale.title: Corner Room
fairytale132@fairytale.description:
This room overlooks the town of Fairyville. Below, you can see all
of the houses spread across the countryside. Far in the distance you
can see Rapunzel's tower, the Shoe of the Old Woman In the Shoe, and
Jack's Cottage. To the east is a spinning room, and to the north is a
room set aside for sewing.

fairytale73@fairytale.title: Bone Room
fairytale73@fairytale.description:
Upon entering this room, you are immediately struck by the
blinding whiteness which fills this room. Bones are scattered
around the room, stacked in piles by species. You recognize cats,
dogs, people, and even a dragon or two.

fairytale32@fairytale.title: Prison
fairytale32@fairytale.description:
You stand in the prison. The air hangs heavy with the stench of
rotted flesh and human waste. Chains and manacles hang from the
walls, above piles of bones which lie in grim repose to the rest of
the room. A small fire burns in one corner, made of rags and rat
droppings.

fairytale115@fairytale.title: Hallway
fairytale115@fairytale.description:
You stand in the hallway outside the two guest rooms (one north,
the other south). To the east is a large, railed porch and to the west
the hallway continues. Pictures of Sleeping Beauty and her
ancestors line the walls.

fairytale72@fairytale.title: Boatwreck
fairytale72@fairytale.description:
A large boat has been smashed here, as though it had been hurled
into the cave by a tremendous force, or some huge giant. Scattered
among the wreckage are bones of unwary travellers.

fairytale28@fairytale.title: Castle Entrance
fairytale28@fairytale.description:
An iron portcullis has been lowered here to prevent further
passage into the castle. Fortunately, the spaces between the bars
are wide enough for you to fit through. To the east, you can see a
large room, and to the west the drawbridge stretches part-way
across the chasm.

fairytale10@fairytale.title: Ferris Wheel
fairytale10@fairytale.description:
A giant wheel stands before you. As you step up to the platform,
you hear a voice call out 'Next!'. The wheel slowly turns, and a car
lowers itself to the north, waiting for you to step in.

fairytale29@fairytale.title: Tapestry Room
fairytale29@fairytale.description:
A large tapestry hangs on the northern wall, depicting many
knights and sorcerors battling a race of giants. The giants appear to
be winning.
The passage continues to the east and the west.

fairytale85@fairytale.title: Mirror Room
fairytale85@fairytale.description:
A staircase descends here to the base of the tower which you now stand in.
A tall, full-length mirror leans against the wall, and a window faces out to
the cliffs below. The mirror has been perfectly carved, and reflects your
image perfectly. You hear a rustling sound behind you.

fairytale121@fairytale.title: Portal
fairytale121@fairytale.description:
You are inside a large, wooden portal. Along the north wall are a
series of levers marked 'up', 'down', and 'open'. The lighting in this
box is provided by tubes which glow softly above you.

fairytale90@fairytale.title: Landing
fairytale90@fairytale.description:
From here, you can see the entire room spread out below you. You
are again amazed at the absence of dirt, and begin to feel rather
grimy yourself. On the landing before you is an oak table and two oak
chairs, all highly polished. A mouse-hole is set into the wainscoting
of the wall, also clean.

fairytale63@fairytale.title: Inside the Statue
fairytale63@fairytale.description:
You have entered the crypt in which Jessimine has been buried.
Light shines in from a hole at the top of the statue and illuminates
the room. You see a picture of a woman, who you recognize as the
Goddess, as well as several tapestries hanging on the walls
depicting Jessimine's sister, her friends, and her true love.

fairytale74@fairytale.title: Rune Cave
fairytale74@fairytale.description:
The walls of this cave have been decorated with red paint, in
various patterns which seem to have some sort of meaning to them.

fairytale11@fairytale.title: In the Car
fairytale11@fairytale.description:
The seats of this ride are red vinyl, and the floors are sticky. You
sit down and rest for a moment, as the car begins to move. Soon you
are high above the carnival grounds, and you can see a huge fun house,
a balloon ride, and a gigantic castle on a cloud in the distance.
After a few minutes, the car returns to the ground.

fairytale123@fairytale.title: Sitting Room
fairytale123@fairytale.description:
You have entered a large sitting room. The walls are lines with
books, which can be reached from a wheeled ladder. Couches are
strategically located around the room to warrant easy conversation.
A bar stands in the corner. You may exit this room to the east or the
west.

fairytale24@fairytale.title: Cloud Cave
fairytale24@fairytale.description:
The clouds form a natural floor here in a hollow which has been
dug from the pile of limestone. The walls and ceiling are tightly
packed, but you cannot help but feel a tiny bit nervous about the
stability of the structure. To the south is a path leading through the
rubble.

fairytale127@fairytale.title: Gallery
fairytale127@fairytale.description:
This gallery is devoted to the art of the royal family. Portraits of
dragons and knights hang on the walls, partitioned off by thin red
cords. A tiny box in the southwest corner hums softly, on which is
mounted a switch.

fairytale34@fairytale.title: The Church
fairytale34@fairytale.description: You stand in the church of Fairyville.

fairytale67@fairytale.title: On the Rainbow
fairytale67@fairytale.description:
The rainbow crosses the hole in the ground. You risk a glance into
the darkness below and feel a sudden rush of vertigo.  The rainbow
continues to the east and the west, where you see a river bank and
a cave, respectively.

fairytale135@fairytale.title: Warm Room
fairytale135@fairytale.description:
A pipe extends up from the floor and opens here. Heat pours from
it, making you sweat almost immediately.

fairytale133@fairytale.title: Sewing Room
fairytale133@fairytale.description:
The east wall of this room is covered with spools of thread. Two
cabinets are set up in the northeast and southeast corners of the
room; each is open and filled with fabric. Dressmaker dolls stand
around the room, with half- finished clothing hanging from them.
Four large tables have been pushed against the west wall for
cutting and sewing. To the south is a large room, and to the north is
a room full of tapestries.

fairytale78@fairytale.title: Well
fairytale78@fairytale.description:
A series of rungs have been set into the wall of this well to allow
access to the bottom.  They are cold and slimy, and you pray that no
rain falls to raise the level of the brackish water below. On the east
wall, far below you, is a door which you suspect you could reach
if you jumped from the rungs.

operator@fairytale.name: operator
operator@fairytale.description: The Ride Operator stands before you, motioning you into the empty car.

burning@fairytale.name: burning
burning@fairytale.description: A burning giant stands here, his fiery gaze fixed on you.

trog@fairytale.name: trog
trog@fairytale.description: A trogdylite stares at you from behind a rock.

cockroach@fairytale.name: cockroach
cockroach@fairytale.description: A huge, green bug stares at you with many-faceted eyes.

exterminator@fairytale.name: exterminator
exterminator@fairytale.description: The Exterminator stands before you, staring at a fly on your shoulder.

proprietor@fairytale.name: proprietor
proprietor@fairytale.description: The Proprietor looks at you expectantly.

porridge@fairytale.name: porridge
porridge@fairytale.description: A bowl of porridge rests on the table.

golden@fairytale.name: golden
golden@fairytale.description: The Golden Goose flies about angrily, protecting her eggs.

big@fairytale.name: big
big@fairytale.description: The biggest giant you have ever seen sits at the foot of the table and laughs.

fatman@fairytale.name: fatman
fatman@fairytale.description: A fat man rolls past you, chuckling gently.

hubbard@fairytale.name: hubbard
hubbard@fairytale.description: Mother Hubbard searches the cupboard for a bone.

mantis@fairytale.name: mantis
mantis@fairytale.description: The mantis is on his knees, praying to the gods for redemption.

bearded@fairytale.name: bearded
bearded@fairytale.description: A bearded woman laughs, pointing at you.

aphid@fairytale.name: aphid
aphid@fairytale.description: The aphid reclines on his couch, blending into his surroundings.

cloud@fairytale.name: cloud
cloud@fairytale.description: A cloud giant is sleeping here, snoring peacefully.

momma@fairytale.name: momma
momma@fairytale.description: Momma Bear hides behind her husband.

girl@fairytale.name: girl
girl@fairytale.description: A girl sits on one end of the see-saw, playing with dolls.

reflection@fairytale.name: reflection
reflection@fairytale.examine: Uh oh, that looks like a demonic version of yourself!
reflection@fairytale.description: Your reflection looks at you from the mirror.

monkey@fairytale.name: monkey
monkey@fairytale.description: A monkey climbs on the bars, playfully kicking at you.

piggy@fairytale.name: piggy
piggy@fairytale.description: This little piggy sticks out his tongue at you.

young@fairytale.name: young
young@fairytale.description: A young man observes the children at play.

burrower@fairytale.name: burrower
burrower@fairytale.description: A Burrower hides in its hole.  All you can see are its eyes.

godmother@fairytale.name: godmother
godmother@fairytale.description: Your Fairy Godmother is here, awaiting your command.

piglet@fairytale.name: piglet
piglet@fairytale.description: This little piggy flips you off.

musician@fairytale.name: musician
musician@fairytale.description: A music major sits here atop a pile of Theory books.

spider@fairytale.name: spider
spider@fairytale.description: A spider hangs from a thin strand of silk.

hawker@fairytale.name: hawker
hawker@fairytale.description: The hawker stands in his booth, calling 'Buy a ticket!'

fish@fairytale.name: fish
fish@fairytale.description: A fish rises out of the water and spits at you!

ladybug@fairytale.name: ladybug
ladybug@fairytale.description: A huge ladybug walks peacefully past you.

trogdylite@fairytale.name: trogdylite
trogdylite@fairytale.description: A Trogdylite stares at you from behind a rock.

sleeping_beauty@fairytale.name: Sleeping_Beauty
sleeping_beauty@fairytale.description: Sleeping Beauty smiles softly, dreaming of happier days.

poppa@fairytale.name: poppa
poppa@fairytale.description: Poppa Bear stands before you, growling angrily.

kidder@fairytale.name: kidder
kidder@fairytale.description: A kidder runs past you, shouting.

horsefly@fairytale.name: horsefly
horsefly@fairytale.description: A horsefly buzzes around your head, looking for a place to land.

baby@fairytale.name: baby
baby@fairytale.description: Baby Bear scampers playfully, oblivious to your presence.

storm@fairytale.name: storm
storm@fairytale.description: A storm giant storms around the room.

adolescent@fairytale.name: adolescent
adolescent@fairytale.description: An adolescent watches the kids play.

roc@fairytale.name: roc
roc@fairytale.description: A Roc circles the nest, glaring at you.

ice@fairytale.name: ice
ice@fairytale.description: An ice giant looks at you coldly.

boyeee@fairytale.name: boyeee
boyeee@fairytale.description: A boyeee plays on the swing set.

bumblebee@fairytale.name: bumblebee
bumblebee@fairytale.description: A bee buzzes gently here, poison dripping from its stinger.

sprite@fairytale.name: sprite
sprite@fairytale.description: The sprite dances in the moonlight, eyeing you warily.

rug@fairytale.name: rug
rug@fairytale.description: Suddenly, the rug comes to life!

clown@fairytale.name: clown
clown@fairytale.description: A clown stands on his head, his eyes upside-down.

oldman@fairytale.name: oldman
oldman@fairytale.description: An old man sits here, waiting for you to hit him.

cinderella@fairytale.name: cinderella
cinderella@fairytale.description: Cinderella stands before you, dressed for the Hunt.

pig@fairytale.name: pig
pig@fairytale.description: This little piggy thumbs his nose at you.

philip@fairytale.name: Philip
philip@fairytale.examine:
His state of grief appears to have overcome the rage that has taken
over the rest of Fairyville. He looks charming, if he weren't in sadness.
philip@fairytale.description: Prince Philip stands here beside the coffin.

dog@fairytale.name: dog
dog@fairytale.description: A dog growls at you angrily.

child@fairytale.name: child
child@fairytale.description: A child plays in the sand.
